alert.note: Alert for Kuskokwim Delta (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 16 at 4:06PM AKST until February 17 at 5:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 5 PM AKST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 10 inches. Northeast winds gusting up to 30 mph. * WHERE...Kuskokwim Delta. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 5 PM AKST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult travel conditions. Areas of blowing snow may reduce visibilities to one half mile or less. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The greatest snowfall rates will occur between 3 AM and noon, with rates up to 1 inch an hour possible. Blowing snow and reduced visibilities are expected along the coast from Hooper Bay to Toksook Bay.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
